p.8: We are looking for a Data Analyst, who will work as part of a team to produce key insights (business, applications, platform) and automate visualizations and reporting for internal and external customers. You should have a strong problem-solving ability and a knack for statistical analysis. If you=E2=80=99re also able to align our data products with our business goals, we=E2=80=99d like to meet you.
p.10: Your ultimate goal will be to help improve our products and business decisions by making the most out of our data.

li: Lead data mining and collection procedures
li.1: Work in close collaboration with data engineer (e.g. DBs, automation,..)
li.4: Conceive, plan and prioritize data projects

li: Proven experience as a Data analyst
li.1: Solid knowledge and experience of data management and visualization techniques e.g Tableau
li.3: Good knowledge of R, Python, and MATLAB
li.4: Experience with SQL and NoSQL databases
li.7: Degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Mathematics or similar field

li: Work with a highly motivated and dedicated team
li.4: Very comfortable working hours (without late evening calls)
li.5: Working directly with the customer's internal team (engineers from the USA)
li.6: Possibility to switch to another project within an account
